full_sentence: Last year major drugcartels, bored with just running shit weed and trained professionals across the border, wanted to show they cared, they then decided to sponsor Mexican Idol, which 9,000+ contestants have to chop off their competitor's heads and put them in coolers leaving'em by the side of the road to show how hardcore they are.

Abundance is what sets you free mate. And if you don't have options, practice talking like you have 2 women ready to suck your balls straight after, it will do the best when it comes to playing natural cos it will settle the underlying problem.

"Would you mind if I hold onto
You so that we both explode?" - said the bomb to the muslim
Can you tell us why do those people always have some abnormal, fucked up shit, going on?
Our society needs to be cleaned of all its Brown rubbish!
